caption: Incredible pizza - some of them very best I’ve had in New York! Fresh, cooked to perfection, leopard print dough, highly recommend!

Waited all day to eat here for the first time with my daughter. We each had a personal pizza. Mine had artichoke n italian ham etc...I had 2 slices and some salad. A few hours later I became violently I'll..forced to throw up..pain all night ...3 days later..still can't eat but bread

Thee best pizza ever!! We drive from DC to Harlem for this exact place!! It's as authentically Italian as you will ever find. I can't wait until we as a nation fully recover from COVID-19, because if you have ever had the FULL dine in experience...Lord have mercy. Anyway, I've loved great pizza since my childhood, Domino's and Papa John's are **meh** but when you want the Real Deal- get here quickly!! You'll be glad you did!!  *Also the family or whoever owns this place are just wonderful people who truly love what they do.  In other words what I'm saying is that if I lived in Harlem, NY I'd be 30 pounds heavier. Enjoy!
Not big on pizza but this is a nice clean spot that I think everybody would enjoy
Good food but be prepared to wait. Doesn't matter if it's delivery, pickup, or dine-in, there will be a substantial wait.
Authentic Pizza...my favorites are the Margherita. Also the salads are amazing!!

Delicious food and phenomenal service. Very diligent about safety and protocols. Clean and warm outdoor seating. Ordered the focaccia, cab, Romana, rughetta and finished with the cannoli and coffee. All excellent fairly priced. Arrived hungry, left full and happy. Will be back
Amazon place. The pizza is delicious, the ambiance is amazing 😍. And do not forget about the tiramisu
Authentic and genuine...pray for them to have La Birra di Meni!
I've only eaten here 1000 times so I'm sorry that I can't give it 10 stars. Oh yes. Oh YES! It's all about the NEOPOLITANO pizza! CANNOLI!!!!!!!!!
This is a great pizzeria and one of the few making real Neapolitan pizzas in the area. Very reasonably priced as well.
nice place
Amazing! Lovely service and food is immaculate

Delicious food and phenomenal service. Very diligent about safety and protocols. Clean and warm outdoor seating. Ordered the focaccia, cab, Romana, rughetta and finished with the cannoli and coffee. All excellent (especially the coffee and wine!) and fairly priced. Arrived hungry, left full and happy. Will be back!
this is the place for za in harlem
Pizza and the feeling here is quality. There was quick, helpful, and friendly service. Bring your hunger - portions are large. Ambience reminds me of Colorado Springs area.
yum
Italian owned restaurant. Pizza is very good and they have a gluten free option that tastes delicious. Very nice italian spot in the neighborhood! Definitely reccomended

A favorite location for tasty Pizza. you will not be disappointed in the menu and service. the service here is better than most. the prices are good for what you get. i can see why they have so many reviews.
Excellent homemade food. Delicious wine/champagne based cocktails and beers, and a great dessert menu

Very clean and safe! This is one of the best pizza in New York. real Italians doing Napoletana style pizza. I could not find any other place un upper Manhattan or Harlem that make pizza like this place. The cocktails are good and the appetizer too.  The wine was a bit disappointed but that is because I only drink good Chilean or Italian wines.  But overall this is a 5 star place!

Great place to visit for pizza lovers like me! It's such a cozy place with staffs that are super friendly and attentive. I really love their pizza, its so crispy and so delicious! 5 star for the foods and 5 star for their great service! I will definitely visit here together with my friends or fam!
One of our favorites! Pizza and other goodies  are delicious. Very personal friendly service! The gluten free pizza is excellent too!!!

On a Friday night, our wait time for 3 pies was 2 hours. We live 2 blocks away from the restaurant. When it finally arrived after having to call to check in on our order twice, our pizza was cold and one pie wasn't even cut into slices. Unacceptable service for take-out, so beware.
This is some great pizza! The flavors were amazing and the online ordering platform was user friendly. Can't wait to try the other pizzas!
Ate here the first night of a vacation to NYC.  Next time I am in the city I will be back multiple times.  I have never had pizza this good before.
Food is always great and staff is very friendly.  One of my favorite brick oven pizzas.
Tried a small pizza with Sottocasa Pizzeria Harlem - delicious! I love the thin crust, and felt it had just the right amount of everything.
This place is adorable for a date or getting together with friends. Pizza and wine great combo. Their hazelnut sorbet is amazing!!
Pizza is authentic, the restaurant is clean and pretty, feels like being in a family kitchen, very cozy inside. Loved it ❤
Don't see why it gets so much hype.  It was just mediocre pizza.  Sauce was whatever.
Stop for Takeout !!! Ordered 2 Pizza to go Pizza was not fully done watery cheese 😕 Definitely Do Not Recommend!!!
We got the deep dish version of the Meateor pizza as well as the toasted kale appetizer. They were both amazingly good and the service was stellar. Great little spot. Wish we had it jn south Florida.
Fabulous salad, pizza and tiramisu. Great outdoor service. Unique find.
Perfect individual pizzas. This is a gem of a restaurant.
Good olive oil. Good crust. Solid flavor. More filling than you think.
pizza and the feeling here is excellent. prices that are reasonable. menu is like a cafe in boston i liked.
Incredible pizza. We ordered the Burrata special(F-S)
The pizza is amazing and their service is excellent, prices and fair and everything is delicious. Food taste just like if you were in Italy.  Superb.
Delicious pizza! Got the Verdure pizza for takeout and it was very good! The dough is authentic and made from scratch, and the sauce has a great flavor to it.

This restaurant was recommended in our guide partly because of its history. The food is average but the price is the highest we paid so far... totally not worth it as there are plenty of better places all around. However the staff was nice and they had baby chair, a plus for us.
Delicious
Best service ever
Pizza and the atmosphere here is excellent. the service here is great. this place has a good feel to it.
What can I say, mamma mia, just delicious. Authentic pizza like in Italy, very nice place and the staff very professional. A must come pizzeria.
I really like there $18 pizza gotta be in the mood for it tho I would trek to patys
Some of the best pizza in New York.
WE ORDERED 4  MARGARITA PIZZA FOR DELIVERY AND THEY WERE DELICIOUS... THANK *Ü* SO MUCH...
Delicious
Excellent pizza. Tasted great and had fresh ingredients.
Great pizza, and fantastic gluten free option as well!
Great authentic Italian pizzas. They have a wide selection and the pizzas are thin, crispy, and packed with natural flavors. Definitely recommend!
Best GLUTEN FREE pizza... EVER!
(Translated by Google) Excellent quality.  (Original) Excelente calidad.
Some of the best pizza you might not have heard of. This place is legit pizza is worth every penny. I’ve attempted to share a slice but have failed all 5 times I had it.

I DON'T USUALLY WRITE REVIEWS BUT THE FACT THAT I'M TYPING THIS RIGHT NOW....SAYS ALOT...PERIOD!.....TRY THE BEST FORGET THE REST!....I WENT AT 5PM...AND THEY DID NOT DISAPPOINT....HARLEM ON THE RISE!....
Best pizza in Harlem
This was one of the best pizzas I've ever eaten. The staff was friendly and willing to advise us which pizza to choose. If I ever visit NY again, this will be a sure stop.

(Translated by Google) Clean and very nice staff, the pizza is excellent and with very good products, the price is good; owners like me Italian are available and very nice; I will definitely come back !!!  (Original) Pulito e personale molto gentile, la pizza è ottima e con prodotti molto buoni, il prezzo è buono; i titolari come me italiani sono disponibili e molto simpatici; sicuramente ritornerò!!!

Really delightful food, with high quality ingredients. Very, very good beers, with a lot of different options on the menu. The staff is super friendly, and the atmosphere is great. It's warm and cozy inside. Not too loud, good to go with friends or with a date.
I can’t describe how incredible the experience was. Everything from the service to the food itself was 5 star worthy. This has topped my list on best pizza in NY without a doubt.
A family-friendly, delicious place to eat. I love to go on the weekends and get the burrata pizza.
Love the pizza from this joint and everything here taste pretty amazing. And I'm happy to say that everything here is reasonably priced too.
Ok it may be great if you actually speak Italian....
Up there with the best in the city - great food and atmosphere.
Pizza tastes authentic from crust down!
Lovely pizza nice service
Food is awesome, gluten free options very good. Have some trouble maintaining delivery service levels on Fridays.
(Translated by Google) Good guys!!!  (Original) Bravi ragazzi!!!
(Translated by Google) Good pizza nice place to try  (Original) Pizza buona posto carino da provare
(Translated by Google) The best pizza in New York. Wood oven  (Original) La pizza più buona di New York. Forno a legna
Great pizza and great spot!
A pretty good place to enjoy a night out.
I'm a fan of thin crust & Sottocasa has it! Delicious & different combinations. You want to smother the crust in the hot oil & leave no crumb behind. Best Pizza in Harlem!
It's good if you like authentic thin crust pizza
I haven't even eaten yet but I feel like I am already full when I am at Sottocasa Pizzeria. They offer the best pizza there is and the place is nice and cozy.

We discovered sottocasa pizzeria in a pizza festival at little Italy of the Bronx and decided to go to Harlem to try their pizza. I tried the pizze bianche with radicchio, it was delicious; a great combination of flavors and the dough was crisp and soft.
Great pizza and service. Good prices too.
Phenomenal Gluten Free pizza. If you love chewy pizza, this is a must have
Looking for a good restaurant with incredible charm and killer food? You’ll find it at Sottocasa. Incredible pizza and they treat everyone like family. What a cool little spot.
Very classy and the Lambrusco is the best I ever tasted. Great service and clean.
My favorite fancy pizzeria in NYC. Good gluten free options.
The ingredients are fresh , the sauce light with an amazing flavor , excellent service!!
The best Pizza I‘ve ever had in the US. The stuff was very friendly and corteous!

Yes!!   Want to experience luxurious Italian food, without the paparazzi, of who’s who, like in NYC.   Then Sotto Casa is the place.  Fresh, quality food, in an environment that welcomes guests as if walking into their own home.    Did I say “Fresh Food”?!    From the appetizer to the main dish, is just Fresh.   Please experience Soto Casa, they won’t disappoint.
Absolutely loved it!

The fact that the staff speaks Italian and have the accent along with the decor makes me feel like I am in Italy. The food is authentic! Friendly, cozy and warm spot! Always greeted with a smile. PLEASE ORDER THE TIRAMISU!
Amazing pizza. Always a great experience! Highly recommend.
Great pizzas, wine choices, romantic ambiance, and fair prices. Coming to NYC we did a lot of research for the best pizza; this is the third and best spot—great traditional Italian pizza.

I have Celiac disease. I rolled the dice and decided to eat the Gluten-Free pizza here despite the risk of cross contamination on the shared oven and mixer. They do their best to keep the cross contamination to a minimum and it worked for me. The gluten free crust is AMAZING, it’s the closest thing I’ve had to real bread in a very long time.

(Translated by Google) The best gluten-free pizza I've ever eaten! In Italy I never found a dough like this, so much so that my husband said he didn't feel any difference between his (normal dough) and mine. Delightful staff.  (Original) La pizza senza glutine più buona che io abbia mai mangiato! In Italia non ho mai trovato un impasto così, tant'è che mio marito ha detto che non si sentiva nessuna differenza tra la sua (impasto normale) e la mia. Personale delizioso.
Delicious pizza, genuine service, great location.
Really good italian pizza! Tasty, crispy and yummy! The owner is italian. The staff is friendly and helpful. The place is clean and cozy!
Beautiful atmosphere and food.
Great atmosphere! Loved our pizzas, spinocci salad and wine. Dessert (cannoli and tiramisu) was skippable.
Delicious!!
The gluten free pizza is next level delicious
We had true Italian pizza.. It was like at home! Recommend it at the 100 % if you want to try something authentic italian
Good taste pizza fast delivery definitely worth it
Quite good pizza and nice staff
Amazing! Everyone is polite and friendly. Pizza and desserts are great!
Excellent pizza experience. Great beer selection
(Translated by Google) Excellent pizzeria and good craft beer  (Original) Excellent pizzeria et bonne bière artisanale
Delicious...friendly owners.

(Translated by Google) The pizza is not bad, especially considering the fact of being in NY, but boys, the Neapolitan pizza is something else! This cannot be compared even as a joke! I think you can compare it to an honest pizza from an average Italian pizzeria. Good, for heaven's sake, but let's not exaggerate with comparisons.  (Original) La pizza non è male, soprattutto considerando il fatto di essere a NY, pero' ragazzi, la pizza napoletana è un'altra cosa! Questa non si puo' paragonare nemmeno per scherzo! Secondo me si puo' paragonare ad un'onesta pizza di una pizzeria media italiana. Buona, per carità, ma non esageriamo con i paragoni.
In one night, I learned of the best authentic pizza spot uptown. Cheers.
This place has a warm spot in my heart they have become my favorite traditional Napolitana in NYC
Matteo the owner made us these yummy spritz.and the pizza was so good..

Ok I admit I’m the worst kind of pizza geek. I imported a pizza oven from Italy that is in my backyard. That being said this place was great. We started with a Ceci (garbanzo bean) salad with tuna and capers and lemon that can only be described as clean and fresh and amazing. Complimenting the bean salad was a delightful leopard pizza. The crust was perfect, sauce light and cheese balanced. One of the best pizzas in the States. Support this place!
Great tasting pizza and enjoyed the craft brewing.
(Translated by Google) Excellent service~ The crust has a unique aroma  (Original) 服務超讚~餅皮有獨特的香味
Loved the food, was a little busy when there but good atmosphere
This spot has my favourite gluten-unfastened pizza. Neopolitan fashion pizza with scrumptious toppings. Try them all.
Good pizza and service authentic Italian.
Delicious!
nice place
Great food and nice, relaxed atmosphere
Transporting. Every bit as good as any of the best in the city, including Roberta's and Motorino. Also very authentic, warm and hospitable! Can't wait to come back.
(Translated by Google) Excellent pizza and informal Italian environment  (Original) Ottima pizza e ambiente informale italiano

(Translated by Google) Spectacular pizzas in harlem For me the best thing is the Calzone. The place, despite being a little hidden, is very nice and inviting. They also make a great meal.  (Original) Pizzes espectaculars a Harlem. Per mi la millor és la Calzone. El local tot i estar una mica amagat és molt bonic i acollidor. A més a més fan un menjar boníssim.

Whether you eat in or take out the service is spot on, very professional, polite and they get the order right every time. The crust is crunchy wood oven crispy and the top chewy delicious. Every pizza we have have been so flavorful, our favorites are the clam and the Prosciutto. We have had pizza in Northern Italy and we could not tell the difference, excellent pizza.
Amazing pizza, Neapolitan style.
So this is how real pizza taste like?? It just blowed my mind. Light is sauce, rich in flavor and wooden oven to perfection.
This place is soooo dope. Now I don’t have to go to Brooklyn for an hour to get great Napoli pizza. This spot is off the chain!!!!!!
Best pizza in Harlem ☺️

Whether you eat in or take out the service is spot on, very professional, polite and they get the order right every time. The crust is crunchy wood oven crispy and the top chewy delicious. Every pizza we have have been so flavorful, our favorites are the clam and the Prosciutto. We have had pizza in Northern Italy and we could not tell the difference, excellent pizza. Loved every second of my experience here, after hearing so many good things. Highly recommend the Salsiccia pizza - Italian sausage and basil.
Excellent
One of the best pizza place in Harlem. Order any pizza. There is no bad choice here.
Delicious food and cozy place, a must try pizza
Incredible
Amazing pizza! Very nice staff. Sandra and Saul were super great! The front is a little hard to see from the street but really yummy and worth stopping! Definitely recommend!

(Translated by Google) Wonderful place. The real Neapolitan pizza in New York !!! The staff is welcoming, attentive and helpful. I highly recommend one or more evenings.  (Original) Locale meraviglioso. La vera pizza napoletana a New York!!! Il personale è accogliente, attento e disponibile. Vi consiglio vivamente una o più serate.
This is a very nice but relaxed pizza place. The pizzas are fancy and tasty. They accommodate families with children well.

(Translated by Google) Location not easily identifiable, almost improbable, great welcome, clean and warm. We ate very well, the note may seem expensive for the French that we are: 113th + 20th tip for 5 basic pizzas, 2 desserts, 1 beer.  (Original) Lieu pas facilement repérable, quasi improbable, super accueil, propre et chaleureux. On a très bien mangé, la note peut semblait chere pour les français que nous sommes:113e +20e de pourboire pour 5 pizzas basiques, 2 desserts, 1 bière.
Bravo on the pizza. Top 3 restaurants and perhaps only 3 to eat at in Harlem.
Very good service. The pizza is amazing!
(Translated by Google) Great pizza  (Original) Ottima pizza
The service was great and the ambiance was perfect. The food was wonderful. Highly recommended!
Nice Pizza, the place is clean and they are very fast if you order a Napolitana. the toilets were a bit dirty, with some sand or tar on the sink
Fantastic pizza
Yummy
Love this place. great food.  service are nice too!!!!!

For me pizza is all about the dough, you need a great pizza dough to have a great crust and in turn have a great pizza. The crust here is amazing, chewy and crispy at the same time. The pizza are small enough to get one per person. Would go here again and would recommend to others.
The best Pizza we ever had on our 3 week roadtrip from Orlando Florida up the Eastcoast to Harlem New York!!

(Translated by Google) Our first meal in NY. Very nice place, great hospitality and service. The pizzas were delicious and generously garnished ... A recommend  (Original) Notre premier repas à NY.  Endroit très agréable, super accueil et service. Les pizzas étaient délicieuses et généreusement garnies... A recommander
This is the best restaurant in the entire world. Both the gluten-free and regular pizzas are unbelievably great.
Good

Delicious fresh pizza, excellent staff and great service in a chilled, relaxed environment. Loved every second of my experience here, after hearing so many good things. Highly recommend the Salsiccia pizza -
Pizza here is very different. In a good way. Perfect spot for late lunch with a beer or two

(Translated by Google) Italian pizza, very good and light, fantastic staff, very nice environment! Absolutely to pass and stop !!!  (Original) Pizza italiana, molto buona e leggera, personale fantastico, ambiente molto carino! Assolutamente da passare e fermarsi!!!
Nice place

I LOVE PIZZA  AND I AM A OFFICIAL NEW YORKER I A VERY  PRESTIGIOUS WHEN IT COMES TO PIZZA THIS PLACE SUPPRISED I HAVE BEEN HOOK EVER SINCE I KNOW I LIKE A PLACE WHEN I START TRYING  DIFFERENT THINGS ON THE MENU  ITS A REALLY COOL PLACE FOR A DATE

Walking near the beautiful churches in Harlem, you found this semi underground cozy and very Italian place. The service is very good, the Italian-artisanal beers, great; but the pizza... mamma Mia!!! One of the best pizzas I’ve had in all my life (and I am a big fan of traditional pizzas). Try the 4 formaggi, which is just unbelievable.
amazing atmosphere
Great authentic pizza, fork and knives type of place. It was great.
If this isn’t best pizza in New York, it’s pretty close. Great food, great atmosphere, great location on the loveliest stretch of Lenox. Go Fri-Sun to get the burrata pizza.
good pizaas
So happy that I found this place , great even for big parties , kids friendly and amazing pizzas !!
Super Yummy

Real authentic Italian pizza. Place was a little hard to find. However it was definitely worth looking for it. If you ever in the Harlem area definitely go check this place out. It's a staple in the community, and a great experience.

(Translated by Google) The best pizza in New York. He ate pizza in Italy and here - one to one. The truth is more expensive than in Italy 2 times)  (Original) Лучшая пицца в Нью Йорке. Ел пиццу  в Италии и здесь - один в один. Правда дороже чем в Италии в 2 раза)
Top pizza,  fast service.
Nice place, buratta pizza is very good.
Awesome Pizza!
Best pizza in Harlem as there aren't that many authentic pizza places anymore. Enjoy the food and the greeters n servers for very nice.

Found this place online with great reviews. Wonderful selection of drinks and food. Had the prosciutto and mozzarella app which was fantastic. Also ordered the burrata pizza which was  really good. My only pet peeve was that it I wish it was served a little hotter. I like my food piping hot! Lol They were quite busy when we were there, Soni think my pie may have sat for a few extra mins before being brought to the table. The service was great and will definitely be back!
Neopolitan v thin, v affordable, great location, an oasis ! very friendly folk here :)
Delicious pizza great beers. Parents: the back room is great for kids

Delicious Neapolitan style pizzas! Our waitress was very personable and efficient. Offered excellent suggestions for wine and appetizers. The space is intimate but not overly crowded. Highly recommend!
Nice pizzas, not noisy, not crowded space, very nice service. Wine and beer good price. They don't accept reservations, there's a wait list!
Great food and great service!!

(Translated by Google) Excellent pizza and an intimate and pleasant atmosphere. Good desserts too, the pearl of pizza in NY!  (Original) Pizza ottima e atmosfera intima e piacevole. Buoni anche i dolci, perla della pizza a NY!
Amazingly Yummilicsious
The best pizza in nyc !!!

(Translated by Google) For all German New Yorkers: one of the best pizzas ever 😍 super delicious baked in a wood oven! In contrast to other pizzerias advertised as particularly good (14-18 $) per pizza and a beer 7 $ 😎🍕 tafelwasser are free. We were thrilled - that's exactly how a pizza should look and taste  (Original) Für alle deutschen New Yorker: eine der besten Pizzen überhaupt 😍 superlecker im Holzofen gebacken! Im Gegensatz zu anderen als besonders toll beworbenen Pizzerien deutlich günstiger (14-18$) pro pizza und ein bier 7$ 😎🍕 tafelwasser gibts umsonst. Wir waren begeistert - genau so soll eine pizza aussehen und schmecken 😍
service and atmosphere amazing
Perfect combination of service and delicious food!
Vegan pizza was really good. Service is good. Wine and ambience was good. No complaints. Make any pizza you want
AMAZING. great pizza, friendly staff, good wine. Can't wait to come back.
Authentic good pizza made by real ITALIANS

Looking for Neopolitan pie, well the one I had here was a perfect duplicate of the one I had Napoli. I guess you can make our own but I suggest the "pre-designed" sections from the menu. Neapolitan and chili oil are on the bar to spice it up. Take it easy with the chili oil it's super spicy and I love heat.

Truly a gem hiding in Harlem. It is below ground so you come upon it unexpectedly. The food was extraordinary in the prices were reasonable for what you received. The service was fantastic and we were well attended to, with a very helpful waitress who offered the lesser expensive options instead of trying to upsell us.
Brick oven style pizza is the best.

I hear this place is delicious. Unfortunately my address, a quarter of a block outside the delivery zone, couldn't be delivered to. Didn't matter that I'm fresh out of surgery. They were unwillling to make an exception. Very, very cruel people run this place.
I love going here. I have been going here for about 2 years now and I cant get enough. Great food, great atmosphere, great service. Highly recommend.
Cozy friendly place.
Delicious
(Translated by Google) Such good pizza is hard to find even in Italy.  (Original) Una pizza così buona è difficile da trovare anche in Italia.

We go here so often that we had to make a rule that we only go when it's raining... Now we pretty much go EVERY time it rains. Good service, consistently great pizza, and a comfortable neighborhood vibe. Make sure you get the spicy oil!
The best gluten free pizza on the planet
(Translated by Google) No Ola pineapple or minced meat and car is not when it is broken  (Original) Ei ola ananas tai jauheliha ja auto ei ole kun se ola rikki
Delicious Italian style pizza, very cozy place
Absolutely love this place
Great spot for a classic margherita and a larger.
Best pizza in new york
Amazing service, wine, and pizza. Made my night for sure. Food is the one thing that makes me truly happy and eating here was an amazing experience overall. But seriously, the pizza was godlike.

Wow! Gluten-free pizza was great, and service was good! Dessert was awesome too!  The pizzas on menu are personal size, and can be made gluten-free. Both of the pizzas we got were delicious, they have more sauce than they do cheese and toppings though.  The Panna Cotta is made on site and was amazing. Highly recommend!
Best pizza in NYC, but it needs to expand the delivery area. At least a few blocks downtown.
There was a freaking bug in my food
The best pizza in koreatown. Hands down. The best you can if you prefer quality! The dominos across the street doesn't even compare at all!
Fantastic pizza
I really enjoyed the pizza and the setting was nice without being pretentious. Prices were reasonable considering the good quality taste.
Lovely little spot with the most authentic and tasty pizzas I've ever had, great salads, Italian wine and hospitality!
(Translated by Google) Excellent pizzeria in the Harlem area ... very Italian flavors  The advice  (Original) Ottima pizzeria in zona Harlem...sapori molto italiani  La consiglio
The pizza talks with your soul
The best pizza in a friendly place. We followed Sotcasa from Atlantic Avenue  in Brooklyn.  We are never disappointed.
Delicious pizza. Especially recommend using the spicy oil on the pizza (not just the dough!)
Great place
Great ingredients, attentive service.

Great pizza and unusual beer options. Good ambiance and there is a back room where families with kids get sequestered, which is  good for everyone including the kids. Pizza options are great and are particularly strong for the vegetarian options.  I would give this place 5 stars were it not for the relatively high prices, in particular for the beer.

The best NYC pizza I’ve had... and I’ve had a LOT of NYC pizza. Perfect dough texture, great sauce, and specialty pizzas are well balanced for flavor. Ambiance was great.  Minus one star for server up-selling me though.
Good pizza

Great gluten free pizza ($4 extra though) but can get any of the options made on gluten free crust. Fresh dough that’s not pre-made! And all the pizzas are a large personal size - not skimpy on the serving.
The pizzas are thin-crust Wood-Fired oven the toppings you can get all them off very very good would recommend this for a quick bite especially a family with kids delicious you cannot go wrong

This is my favorite restaurant in New York. The food is truly authentic Italian pizza, salads, and drinks. My boyfriend and I come here often for date night and we have never gotten tired of their menu. The staff always makes us feel at home. I’ve brought family and friends here over the past year and a half, and I won’t stop! They all agree that it was the best pizza they’ve had.
Great food, awesome service.

Great Neapolitan-style pizza, industrial and artisanl beers, friendly Italian staff. If you go there during peak hours you'll probably have to wait, since they do not  take reservations (last friday we were there at 8:30 and we were seated at 9:15). But if it's so busy, that's for a reason! Prices are very reasonable. One of top spots for pizza in NYC

The pizza in this location is actually pretty good. The only thing I didn’t like was that the pizza got a little soggy. Other then that everything else was good. The environment was nice, the staff were friendly, the people were cool. If you wanna come here with your friends and family then this is a good spot to get pizza. Just keep in mind, with just two people you’ll spend about $30-50
Burrata pizza served on weekends is pretty great!
The best pizza I have had in NYC

(Translated by Google) Last day in NYC, we wanted something that was top! This pizzeria surprised us positively at every possible point. Exceptional service, an extremely delicious pizza much like the one we ate in Italy last year. Contrary to what many people may think the value is not per piece but rather an average pizza. Ate me and my wife one alone. Value averaged $ 17 a pizza (4 pieces). What I saw most were people asking for the rest to take. Result: We left extremely satisfied. If we go back to New York, it will be a sure visit.  (Original) Último dia em NYC, queríamos alguma coisa que fosse top! Essa pizzaria nos surpreendeu positivamente em todos os pontos possíveis. Atendimento excepcional, uma pizza extremamente deliciosa muita parecida com a que comemos na Itália no ano passado. Ao contrário do que muita gente pode pensar o valor não é por pedaço e sim uma pizza média. Comemos eu e minha esposa uma apenas. Valor em média de 17 dólares a pizza(4 pedaços). O que mais vi foram pessoas pedindo o restante para levar. Resultado: Saímos extremamente satisfeitos. Se voltarmos a Nova York, será uma visita certa.
username: Thiago Luiz de Castro e Silva

caption: Amazing!! The pizza and wine!!
Authentic Neopolitan pizza. Nice vibe
We took prosciutto pizza and margarita pizza which were awesome,especially tomato sauce was excellent taste 🍴
The burrata pizza is really very good. Gooey cheese, soft, slightly chewy crust, and good quality ingredients. The cannoli is made in house and the draft moretti beer is crisp and refreshing.
One of the best Pizzas I have ever eaten in my life!!
Cozy place, such a good experience and pizza was perfect 👌

I went here with my family and I got a calzone. It was very good and had a rich flavor. The rest of them got pizza and they were either a hit or miss. Make sure you get recommendations on what to order to avoid getting their bad dishes.
Delicious pizza. Lovely staff. Nice atmosphere. If you are looking for a real Italian pizza on NYC this is the place to go. Highly recommended.
Love the pizza! Always delicious  Service is friendly, but a little slow - plan to spend a little chunk of time here.
Awesome!
Simply amazing pizza, devoured without even blinking

Omgsh!!! The best pizza in the east coast!!! Very friendly Italian owners and cozy/welcoming environment. I would eat here daily if I could. Great and fast service too! Their pizzas are thin , full of flavor, juicy, and chewy but crispy at the same time. Words can't describe, eat here if you can!!!!
If you want to eat real Italian pizza I highly recommend it. Great atmosphere that you will feel like you are at home

I LOVE Sottocasa. The very best pizza place I’ve ever been to in LIFE. you must try the pizza, any one of them. My favorite is the Quattro Staggione. They also have good artisanal beers! @omsatyayoga
We had pizza, which was excellent. The arugula and artichoke salad very tasty. Great place.

The pizza had a pretty good flavor, but was very soggy. The service was great in the beginning, until our waitress disappeared for a while. :'(
Warm atmosphere and perhaps the nicest staff in the entire world. Their crust is incredible and they have a really solid and reasonably priced wine selection. An uptown gem and well worth the trip

Wonderful Pizza! I'm Italian guys and let me say that these guys really know how to make a delicious real Italian pizza. The Buffalo mozzarella is real, juicy and so tasty. The dough is perfeclty cooked and managed, the tomato souce is so sweet and fresh that perflectly reminds me of my hometown. In my opinion the best pizza in NYC. And don't forget to try their faboulous tiramisù!!
Was expecting to be blown away. That didn't happen,  but it was good.
Great Italian wood fired pizza. Extensive Italian craft beer menu. Nice selection of deserts.
Fantastic pizza. Ordered the Laura and Buratta pies, both were terrific. The Laura was particularly delicious, and I'll definitely be ordering it again.

Having spent a month away in Italy, Sottocasa’s pizza is the most authentic to what I ate on my stay. What’s even more amazing is that this place is uptown! Sottocasa offers a wide variety of choices, starting with fresh salads to incredible pizzas (available gluten free for an additional charge, and TOTALLY worth it), to delicious desserts and wines. This is a great place for a night out with friends, or to even order delivery from if you live in the neighborhood. Try the truffle and speck pizza!!
Good margherita pizza 🍕

Ammmaaazzzzziiinnnggggg! The hospitality is incredibly friendly and attentive, the smell and food is magnificent and price is unbelievably reasonable. Highly recommend for any kind of dates, whether friends, family, or significant others.
Hidden Italian gen
Delicious pizza. Wine selection is also good and surprisingly affordable.

The pizza is amazing and service is excellent! If you like hot sausage you have got to try the salsiccia pizza and dip the crust into their spicy olive oil! Amazing!
Handmade pizza perfection

We were pleasantly surprised by the high quality of the pizzas here, rivaling those you find on the streets of Napoli. High quality ingredients and very nicely done base, just like true Napolitean pizza. Pizzas and drinks are a bit pricey, but in my opinion totally justified in light of the very good service, nice atmosphere and top-notch pizzas. Show less
Fantastic. The best pizzas in NYC and the best I have eaten anywhere, even in Italy.

Great cozy pizza spot in Harlem. Pizza is yummy and they offer a variety of interesting and delicious topping combinations. They also have a good beer and wine selection. Service is friendly and efficient. Lovely place for brunch when you're craving pizza!
Nice pizzas, Italian vibe

(Translated by Google) Exquisite pizzas and very attentive staff. I recommend you book so you do not have to wait that long or arrive at the hotel for 17 hrs.  (Original) Exquisitas pizzas y personal muy atento. Les recomiendo reservar para no tener que esperar tanto o llegar tipo 17 hrs.

Absolutely delicious pizza served by incredibly nice and efficient staff.  Everything was fabulous -- our large group had 5 different pizzas and they were all great.  Good wine selection and the desserts are lovely.  Actually,  this is one of the BEST places for pizza in NYC, and that is saying a lot in a city with so many pizza choices.  You owe it to yourself to visit this wonderful, casual but sophisticated restaurant in Harlem..
+ pizza it’s delicious + service is very helpful and polite + good italian beers and wines ++++ a place you have to go definetly. (There are two locations)

A fantastic find in Harlem. Amazing, homecoooked pizza and a great atmosphere.

It was a great experience. Very attentive customer service. The Pizza ingredients were amazing, fresh and high quality. Interestingly good selection of Italian wines and beer. Definitely worth the time
Great pizza, nice atmosphere, and friendly service (also very kid-friendly). The perfect neighborhood spot.  Note that it's down a set of stairs for those with strollers or disabilities.

Amazing pizzas and focaccia. Warm and welcoming atmosphere. Feels like I'm back in Italy.

Best pizza north of the Wall you guys! Also great antipasti, fine cocktails, warm and inviting service, great wine collection. Seriously, why are you still reading this review instead of placing your order?!

Wonderful little Italian place in Harlem

(Translated by Google) Master pizza! Do I have to go back to NEW YORK to eat such a delicious pizza ?! That evening we decided to try pizza abroad to understand the differences between Italy and America, instead we found a pizzeria so good that we were very impressed! The place is very welcoming, the staff more than helpful and the pizza delicious. One of the owners was kind enough to give us advice on the most convenient places and literally gave us a tutorial on how the tips to write on the receipt work. <3 Maximum tip for them! <3 Really many compliments to all the staff! What then inside was full of Italians and I answered everyone in English because initially I didn't know XD !!  (Original) Pizza da maestro! Devo tornare a NEW YORK per mangiare una pizza così squisita?! Quella sera decidemmo di provare la pizza all estero per capire le diversità tra italia e america, invece abbiamo trovato una pizzeria talmente buona che siamo rimasti molto colpiti! Il locale è molto accogliente, il personale più che disponibile e la pizza squisita. Uno dei proprietari è stato così gentile da darci  dei consigli sui posti più convenienti e ci ha letteralmente fatto un tutorial su come funzionano le tip da scrivere sullo scontrino. <3 Mancia massima per loro! <3 Davvero tanti complimenti a tutto lo staff! Che poi dentro era pieno di italiani e io rispondevo a tutti in inglese perché inizialmente nn lo sapevo XD !!
Love it
Great pizza and nice people!
Might be the best pizza I had in America. Fresh ingredients used. Great quality cheeses.

This is the most amazing pizzeria. My family and I went for dinner and they had something for all of us. I'm the weirdo vegan and I couldn't believe they had amazing vegan pizza options. So delicious! Highly recommend.

SottoCasa Pizzeria is an amazing place if you love pizza crust. A lot of people say that New York pizza crust is only thin, but this place has doughy and ample crust to enjoy. The atmosphere was busy and lively when I went, but it wasn't overly crowded. It is a very casual and laid back place that has friendly staff. They know their business there, and we were out of the door within an hour of being seated. I didn't feel rushed, but it was a very efficient and streamlined process to the meal. I had mozzarella and mushroom on my pie, and it was super zesty and creamy tasting. I think the mozzarella was fresh, and the mushrooms might have been as well. Either way, the pizza was properly cooked and spiced with herbs, so I was drooling throughout my dinner. There's a lot of pizzerias in New York City, but this one is a top five for me, and I would recommend it to anyone, especially vegetarians.

We tried Verdura which is a really good pizza and Panna Cotta. Food was fresh and delicious. It was also appropriately priced and the service was excellent. Staff is super friendly and we were generally satisfied with the ambience too. Will come again.

(Translated by Google) Very, very hospitable Italian in the middle of Harlem. The salad, pizza, and tiramisu were great. However, prices are also at a very good level for the good food from Europe.  (Original) Sehr, sehr gastfreundlicher …

Best gluten free pizza I’ve ever had, really cozy atmosphere

Great authentic Italian Pizza. Very helpful wait staff who can answer your questions and will let you know what is unfortunately out of stock.

Great pizza and wonderful staff. We had the burrata pizza (only available Friday - Sunday), which was excellent and had a nice basil flavor. The crust is delicious, unlike many places where crust=cardboard. Strongly recommend
A truly amazing pizza.  Great service and atmosphere.  And they offer gluten free pizza that is actually delicious!

Actual food quality seems quite good; you'll probably have a fine experience eating in. Bad experience with delivery though: they ignored my instructions for delivery time (there's a specific place to enter it on the website) and gluten free and number of slices options (check boxes on the site... obviously the failure to cut into eight slices is no biggie) so for our $55 for two pies and salads we got room temp soggy crusted pizza because it sat around an hour before I got home from work, and one of us with a fortunately mild wheat allergy suffered minor repercussions after eating the not-noticed regular crust pie. No response to message left via the site (yet).
Excellent food, service and people.
Absolutely delicious.

(Translated by Google) We came to try the best pizza in NY, the disappointment was great, the pizzas have no flavor, we tried the 4 cheeses and the margarita, only if you put it spicy you get to feel something, very little cheese, the extremely thin dough, it looked like a pancake , the prices ..... I did not agree to the quality, so you buy a giant pizza, here they give you an individual one, there is a star that is x the setting that is fine, with respect to the attention, we attended one A woman who spoke half Italian and half very closed English, that on the second attempt to understand what she wanted to say, she pouted. I do not recommend the place  (Original) Vinimos a probar la mejor pizza de NY, fue grande la decepción, las pizzas no tienen sabor, probamos la 4 quesos y la margarita, solo si le pones picante llegas a sentír algo, muy poco queso, la masa extremadamente fina, parecía un panqueque, los precios..... Nada acordé a la calidad, por lo que te compras una pizza gigante, acá te dan una individual, hay una estrella q es x la ambientación q esta bien, con respecto a la atención, nos atendió una mujer q hablaba mitad italiano mitad un inglés muy cerrado, q al segundo intento por entender q nos quería decir puso mala cara. Very charming and warm Italian cusine set in an authentic brownstone in Harlem. Service was quick and courteous. Original artwork is displayed for sale through out the restaurant. Tried the mixed greens and brick oven pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil and tomato. Nice portion size. Everything was just right would definitely go back again.
Great food nice atmosphere

Absolutely delicious- Original Italian food!

(Translated by Google) If you are Italian, you cannot miss this pizzeria. All the while you will feel like you are in a real Neapolitan pizzeria, with Italian or Italian-speaking staff. The platter is recommended: quality Italian cured meats and cheeses. The pizza is made of Neapolitan dough, high and soft, with an excellent variety of ingredients. A true corner of Italy in the middle of Harlem.  (Original) Se siete italiani, non potete perdervi questa pizzeria. Per tutto il tempo vi sembrerà di stare in una vera pizzeria napoletana, con personale italiano o che parla benissimo italiano. Consigliato il tagliere: salumi e formaggi italiani di qualità. La pizza è ad impasto napoletano, alta e morbida, ottima varietà di ingredienti. Un vero angolo d'Italia nel bel mezzo di Harlem.

Amazing Italian pizza place in Harlem!  Flavorful and crunchy crust, topped with few high quality fresh ingredients.  I would strongly recommend the Burrata Pizza (Fri-Sun only. For $17 you can get creamy perfection.

Are you looking for a little piece of Italy in Harlem? Sottocasa is the place you wanna go. Full Italian style, pizza, wine, beer and hospitality. I knew I was in Italy when they ask me if I wanted the spicy oil! Every pizzeria in Italy asks you that! The place is cozy and the pizza very good! Very nice crust and everything! If you are an Italian like me looking for good pizza definitely go!
Believe the reviews. Awesome stuff. Well worth the hike.

SottoCasa is a great pizza place. The dough is authentic and my Italian friend approves of the pizza. The staff is wonderful and very friendly. I would go back there with my coworkers. We had a great time. Highly recommended.

SottoCasa Pizzeria is an amazing place if you love pizza crust. A lot of people say that New York pizza crust is only thin, but this place has doughy and ample crust to enjoy. The atmosphere was busy and lively when I went, but it wasn't overly crowded. It is a very casual and laid back place that has friendly staff. They know their business there, and we were out of the door within an hour of being seated. I didn't feel rushed, but it was a very efficient and streamlined process to the meal. I had mozzarella and mushroom on my pie, and it was super zesty and creamy tasting. I think the mozzarella was fresh, and the mushrooms might have been as well. Either way, the pizza was properly cooked and spiced with herbs, so I was drooling throughout my dinner. There's a lot of pizzerias in New York City, but this one is a top five for me, and I would recommend it to anyone, especially vegetarians.
Everything was great. My pizza wasn’t quite as crisp as I normally like but I’ll go back and just ask for the thing well done.
This is such a hidden gem in Harlem. The staff is very attentive and welcoming, the place is decently large and very family-friendly, and the pizzas are delicious! We'll be coming back here.
The best Neapolitan pizza in NYC. 100% authentic. Italian family owned and operated. Such friendly service.
One of the best pizza in town ( and I am Italian). Very warm service, family style. Nice vibe. Hghly recommended
